item.title: net user
item.description: Domain Check if account is locked This is case sensitive 1net user /domain <username> | find "Account active" Unlock account 1Net user <username> /domain /active:yes Reset password 1net user <username> <password> /domain /active:Yes Add to group 1net localgroup <groupname> <domain>/<username> /add Local
